label: Leads - 2nd-We want you on our team

values.Email Content:
Hi member('First Name'), 

 

Become Part of the Team!

 

We're so excited to show you some of the skills you'll learn, and what it's like to be a part of the Gracie Barra Team! Just to get a quick glimpse, click on the link below :
ADULT PROGRAM
KIDS PROGRAM

Let's Get Started.  Please reply to this email with a day and time that would work best for you to schedule the intro.  This intro class is at no cost to you!

 

Kind Regards,

${spaceAttributes('School Name')}

Address: ${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

Phone: ${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

values.Subject: Become Part of the Gracie Barra Team!

values.Email Content:
Hi member('First Name'),

 

Remember when you reached out to learn more about Gracie Barra Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and Self-Defense? Well, we’ve been holding a spot for you on the mats! It’s been a little while, and we totally get it—life gets busy with work, school, Netflix marathons, and the occasional debate over what’s for dinner. But hey, now’s the perfect time to take that next step!

 

Let’s make it happen: your FREE intro class is waiting for you or your child.

 

Here’s what’s in store:

  • An awesome workout that doesn’t feel like a chore.
  • A chance to learn the most effective martial art on the planet.
  • All the fun of rolling on the floor without the awkward carpet burns.

Why wait any longer? Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu isn’t just a sport—it’s a game-changer. You’ll get in amazing shape, learn valuable self-defense skills, and become part of an incredible community. Plus, let’s be honest—who doesn’t want to say they’re practicing the fastest-growing martial art in the world?

 

So go ahead, respond to this email and let’s get your free intro class scheduled. Your spot is ready, your journey awaits, and the mats are calling your name!

 

See you soon—don’t forget your water bottle (and maybe some snacks for after)! 👊🔺

 

Cheers,

${submitterName}

${spaceAttributes('School Name')}

${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

values.Email Content:
Hi member('First Name')!

 

It was great to have you on the mat yesterday at ${spaceAttributes('School Name')}.

We truly hope you got to experience Gracie Barra Brazilian Jiu Jitsu physically, mentally and socially in a positive way.

Please let me know when you are ready to take the next step in your journey with us!

We would love to have you as a valued Gracie Barra team member!

Kind Regards,

${spaceAttributes('School Name')}

${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

values.Subject: Give yourself a chance. Why train martial arts?

label: Leads - 14 days after the intro class

values.Email Content:
Hi member('First Name')! 

 

Here are another 7 reasons why Gracie Barra Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu is awesome!


1) Dealing with failure – If you can show me someone who hasn’t failed in their life, I’ll show you someone who’s not living life to their full potential. When you train in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu you will have times you will lose. How will you deal with it? Will you let your emotions take over? Quit? Get angry? Retaliate? Or will you learn from the experience and grow? Embrace failure; it may be the best education you will ever get.


2) Patience – Life can be hard and Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu is no different. It takes a long time to become proficient. It takes years to earn new belts. Those who start, encounter adversity and quit have lost sight of what having patience will reward them- both on the mats as well as most of the areas of their life. When we let ourselves quit, we devalue ourselves. You need to be patient to grow.


3) Humility – Not everyone has humility, but it is a lesson taught daily in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu. There is so much to learn. You will learn things from your instructors, training partners and students. It never stops. There is great humility learned knowing that we can practice something for over 30 years and still learn from someone half our age or someone with less time studying than ourselves.


4) Community – Becoming a Gracie Barra Student you join the biggest Jiu-Jitsu organization in the world. You will meet the most amazing people on the mats and experience the family environment and mutual support that come from all four corners of the world.

 

5) Encouraging Non-Violent Conflict Resolution – If you think that Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu promotes violent behavior is justified, then your knowledge probably comes from television or movies. In fact, Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu teaches us peaceful, non-violent conflict resolution skills and emphasizes the importance of avoiding a physical altercation.


6) Developing Teamwork Skills – Whether you are training to get a new belt or sparring in a practice setting to master a new maneuver, most of the things we do in our Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu classes require a training partner. Working together to learn new things and accomplish goals is an important life lesson for anyone to learn.


7) Improvement in Other Areas of Life – The benefits of Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu training don’t end when you step off the mats. The boost in confidence, increased fitness level and sense of belonging to a very special group of human beings will definitely change the way you see life and engage with it. Others around you will quickly notice the positive changes and get inspired to do the same. Prepare yourself to become an unintentional role model to the people in your life!


Flavio's motivational video: https://youtu.be/jqXGpk5F7E0

 

Kind Regards,

${submitterName}

${spaceAttributes('School Name')}

${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

values.Subject: Don't Give Up On Yourself

label: Members - 0 days after converted from a lead

values.Email Content:
Hi member('First Name'),

 

Welcome to the team—we’re thrilled to have you at ${spaceAttributes('School Name')}! Whether you’re completely new to Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu (BJJ) or returning to the mats, we’re honored that you’ve chosen us to guide you on this incredible journey.

 

Here’s what you can look forward to:

 

  • World-class instruction, motivation, and support from our dedicated staff.
  • The chance to learn the Gracie Barra curriculum of techniques, developed by Master Carlos Gracie Jr.
  • A welcoming and encouraging environment, both on and off the mats.

Our only expectation from you? Show up consistently! BJJ is a journey, and with regular training, you’ll build skills, confidence, and friendships that will last a lifetime.

 

If you have any questions or concerns, our staff is always here to help. You can also visit our website at ${spaceAttributes('School Website')} for information on our schedule, instructor bios, the history of Gracie Barra, and more.

 

Oh, and one quick tip: tying your belt and pants can feel like a puzzle at first (trust us, even some purple belts still struggle 😄). Here’s a handy video from Gracie Barra World Champion Instructor Prof. Flavio Almeida to help you out: www.youtube.com/watch?v=BJFB80epKJo.

 

We can’t wait to see you on the mats and watch you grow through this amazing martial art. Let the journey begin!

 

Welcome to Gracie Barra!

 

See you soon,
The ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} Team

${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

Our only expectation from you? Show up consistently! BJJ is a journey, and with regular training, you’ll build skills, confidence, and friendships that will last a lifetime.

 

If you have any questions or concerns, our staff is always here to help. You can also visit our website at ${spaceAttributes('School Website')} for information on our schedule, instructor bios, the history of Gracie Barra, and more.

 

Oh, and one quick tip: tying your belt and pants can feel like a puzzle at first (trust us, even some purple belts still struggle 😄). Here’s a handy video from Gracie Barra World Champion Instructor Prof. Flavio Almeida to help you out: www.youtube.com/watch?v=BJFB80epKJo.

 

We can’t wait to see you on the mats and watch you grow through this amazing martial art. Let the journey begin!

 

Welcome to Gracie Barra!

 

See you soon,
The ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} Team

${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

values.Subject: You’re Off to an Amazing Start! 🥋

label: Members - 30 days after converted from a lead

values.Email Content:
Hi member('First Name'),

 

It’s been about a month since you started your Jiu-Jitsu journey at ${spaceAttributes('School Name')}, and we’re so proud of the effort you’ve been putting in!

 

Jiu-Jitsu isn’t easy, and the fact that you’ve stuck with it shows incredible determination. By now, you’ve probably had some tough moments—maybe a technique didn’t click right away, or you’ve felt a bit lost in the middle of class. That’s normal! What really matters is that you’re still showing up and giving it your all.

 

Here’s the truth: every small win you’ve had so far (even just learning how to shrimp properly!) is part of a much bigger transformation. With consistency, those small victories will add up to big breakthroughs—and we’re here to guide you every step of the way.

 

If you haven’t already, take a moment to think about:

What have you learned so far that you’re proud of?
How has Jiu-Jitsu challenged you in ways you didn’t expect?
We’d love to hear about it! Feel free to chat with your instructors or training partners—they’re here to help you grow and overcome any obstacles you encounter.

 

Thank you for trusting us to be part of your journey. You’ve already come so far, and this is just the beginning. The next 30 days are going to be even better—let’s make it happen!

 

See you in class,
The ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} Team

${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

values.Subject: 30 Days of Jiu-Jitsu—You’re Crushing It!

label: Members - 90 days after converted from a lead

values.Email Content:
Hi member('First Name'),

 

Wow—90 days into your Jiu-Jitsu journey at ${spaceAttributes('School Name')}! Take a moment to appreciate what you’ve accomplished.


By now, you’re not just a beginner figuring things out—you’re officially part of the team. You’ve likely discovered the flow of training, gotten to know your classmates, and started to see how Jiu-Jitsu is shaping not just your body, but also your mindset.

 

3 Months In: What Have You Learned?


At this point, you’ve likely experienced:

 

  • Moments of clarity—like when a technique finally clicks.
    Tough rolls that teach you resilience and remind you that growth comes from challenge.
  • A stronger connection with the people you train with—your teammates who push and support you.
  • It’s time to think about what’s next. Jiu-Jitsu is a lifelong journey, and the first three months are just the start. From here, it’s all about refining your skills, diving deeper into the techniques, and building on the foundation you’ve worked so hard to create.

 

What’s Next for You?

 

  • Set a goal for your next 90 days. Maybe it’s attending a certain number of classes, mastering a specific technique, or improving your fitness.
    Stay consistent, even when it gets tough. The more you show up, the more breakthroughs you’ll have.
  • Keep embracing the journey. Progress isn’t linear, but it’s always worth it.You’ve come so far already, and we’re excited to see where the next steps take you.
  • If you have any questions or want guidance on your training, don’t hesitate to talk to your instructors—we’re here for you.

 

Keep up the amazing work, and we’ll see you on the mats!

 

Warm regards,
The ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} Team

values.Subject: 90 Days of Jiu-Jitsu—Look How Far You’ve Come! 🥋

label: Members - 120 days after converted from a lead

values.Email Content:
Hi member('First Name'),

 

Congratulations on reaching your 120-day milestone at ${spaceAttributes('School Name')}! By now, you’ve likely experienced some big wins, some challenges, and lots of growth.

 

As you continue to develop your skills, here are some key tips and reminders to help you stay on track and make the most of your training:

 

Key Tips for Your Jiu-Jitsu Journey


1️⃣ Stay Consistent: Showing up regularly is the single most important thing you can do to improve.

 

2️⃣ Make Short-Term Goals: Focus on specific areas like improving your guard passing, perfecting a mount escape, or mastering a submission.

 

3️⃣ Learn From Every Roll: Success in Jiu-Jitsu isn’t measured by wins—it’s measured by how much you learn from your mistakes.

 

4️⃣ Ask Questions: Don’t hesitate to ask your instructors for advice. Jiu-Jitsu is a team effort, and we’re here to help.

 

5️⃣ Drill, Drill, Drill: Repetition builds mastery. Solo or with a partner, drilling is where the magic happens.

 

6️⃣ Stay Positive: The mats are a place to grow and improve, not to stress. Leave the outside world behind and focus on having fun.

 

7️⃣ Keep a Clean Gi (and Attitude): Your Gi is your second skin. Keep it fresh, and bring a respectful mindset to every class.

 

8️⃣ Reflect on Progress: Take a moment to recognize how far you’ve come since your first class. Remember, everyone’s journey is unique, so focus on your own growth.

 

Next Steps: What’s your next goal? Maybe it’s attending more classes, competing in a tournament, or refining a specific skill. Whatever it is, we’re here to support you every step of the way.

 

Thank you for your dedication and for being part of the ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} family. We’re excited to see you continue to grow and achieve new milestones.

 

See you on the mats,

${spaceAttributes('School Name')}
${spaceAttributes('School Address')}
${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

Key Tips for Your Jiu-Jitsu Journey


1️⃣ Stay Consistent: Showing up regularly is the single most important thing you can do to improve.

 

2️⃣ Make Short-Term Goals: Focus on specific areas like improving your guard passing, perfecting a mount escape, or mastering a submission.

 

3️⃣ Learn From Every Roll: Success in Jiu-Jitsu isn’t measured by wins—it’s measured by how much you learn from your mistakes.

 

4️⃣ Ask Questions: Don’t hesitate to ask your instructors for advice. Jiu-Jitsu is a team effort, and we’re here to help.

 

5️⃣ Drill, Drill, Drill: Repetition builds mastery. Solo or with a partner, drilling is where the magic happens.

 

6️⃣ Stay Positive: The mats are a place to grow and improve, not to stress. Leave the outside world behind and focus on having fun.

 

7️⃣ Keep a Clean Gi (and Attitude): Your Gi is your second skin. Keep it fresh, and bring a respectful mindset to every class.

 

8️⃣ Reflect on Progress: Take a moment to recognize how far you’ve come since your first class. Remember, everyone’s journey is unique, so focus on your own growth.

 

Next Steps: What’s your next goal? Maybe it’s attending more classes, competing in a tournament, or refining a specific skill. Whatever it is, we’re here to support you every step of the way.

 

Thank you for your dedication and for being part of the ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} family. We’re excited to see you continue to grow and achieve new milestones.

 

See you on the mats,

${spaceAttributes('School Name')}
${spaceAttributes('School Address')}
${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

values.Subject: I wish someone had told me that when I was a white belt.

label: Members - 6 months after conversion from a lead

values.Email Content:
Hi member('First Name'),

 

Congratulations on reaching 6 months of training at ${spaceAttributes('School Name')}! This is a huge milestone, and it shows your dedication to embracing one of the most challenging and rewarding journeys out there.

 

6 Months In: You’re Not the Same Person


Think about where you were on day one:

Did tying your belt feel like a puzzle?
Did positions like guard or mount feel awkward or overwhelming?
Did you wonder if you’d ever get through a roll without feeling completely lost?


Now, here you are—6 months later. You’ve come so far. Moves that once seemed impossible now feel instinctive, and your time on the mats has started shaping not just your skills but your mindset.

 

The Next Phase of Your Journey


At this point, you’ve likely discovered that Jiu-Jitsu is about more than just techniques—it’s about growth, patience, and resilience. To keep leveling up, here are a few ways to approach your next phase:

 

1️⃣ Refine your fundamentals. Mastery comes from repetition. Focus on making your basics unshakeable.


2️⃣ Embrace challenges. Whether it’s rolling with tougher partners or exploring new techniques, lean into what feels difficult. That’s where real growth happens.


3️⃣ Find your game. By now, you’ve likely discovered moves or positions that feel natural to you. Start building your game around them while continuing to experiment.

 

Reflect on Your Progress


Jiu-Jitsu is unique because it’s not just about the destination—it’s about how much you grow along the way. Take a moment to reflect on:

 

The challenges you’ve overcome since starting.
The confidence and calm you’ve gained in tough situations.
The friendships and community you’ve built on the mats.
Your journey is uniquely yours, and we’re honored to be part of it.

 

Stay Connected


As you move forward, don’t hesitate to talk to your instructors about your progress, ask for tips, or even share your goals. We’re here to support you every step of the way.

 

Thank you for being part of the ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} family!

 

Here’s to the next 6 months of growth, learning, and success!

 

See you on the mats,

The ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} Team

${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

values.Email Content:
Hi member('First Name')!

 

All of the staff at Gracie Barra would like to wish you a very Happy Birthday!

 

You’re an amazing part of our team, and we hope your day is filled with joy, celebration, and maybe even a little time on the mats. Thank you for being part of the Gracie Barra family—we’re so lucky to have you!

 

Have an incredible birthday, and we can’t wait to see you soon!

 

Kind Regards,
${spaceAttributes('School Name')} Team

Address: ${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

values.Subject: 🎉 Happy Birthday from Your Gracie Barra Family! 🎉

values.Email Content:
Hi member('First Name'), 


We miss you here at ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} and we would love to train with you again. Do you still have your uniform? If so, you are in luck! We are going to give you 30 days of training on us.


The path to black belt can be a long one. Work, family, and life in general can get in your way. There is always something to pull you from the path you set out on when you signed up.

 

The great thing about Gracie Barra Jiu Jitsu is that you can always jump back on that path.


Give us a call and let us know when you are coming back, we can’t wait to see you.


Kind Regards,
${submitterName}


I've seen 1000 people quit! Video:
https://youtu.be/kT2T-cNvm60

values.Subject: We want you back!

values.Email Content:
Hi member('First Name'), 

 

We hope you've been doing well since we last saw you at ${spaceAttributes('School Name')}! It’s hard to believe it’s been a year since you left the mats, and we wanted to check in to see how things are going.

 

Whether you’ve been focused on other goals or simply taking a break, we’d love to welcome you back whenever you're ready. Training in jiu-jitsu offers so many benefits—from improved fitness and confidence to being part of an encouraging community.

 

To give you some extra inspiration, check out this incredible video from Gracie Barra World Champion Flavio Almeida:
🎥 Watch Here

 

His passion for jiu-jitsu and dedication to the craft reminds us how impactful stepping back on the mats can be!

 

If you’ve been thinking about returning, there’s no better time! Feel free to drop by for a class or reach out if you have any questions.

 

You’ve always been part of the ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} family, and we’d love to see you back on the mats!

 

OSS!

${spaceAttributes('School Name')}

${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

values.Subject: Ready to Roll Again? We Miss You on the Mats!

values.Email Content:
Hi member('First Name'), 


We miss you here at ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} and we want you back! We are going to give you 30 days of training! 


The path to black belt can be a long one. Work, family and life in general can get in your way, there is always something to pull you from the path you set out on when you signed up. The great thing about Gracie Barra Jiu Jitsu is that you can always jump back on that path!


Give us a call and let us know when you are coming back! We can’t wait to see you.


Kind Regards,
${submitterName}

 

${spaceAttributes('School Name')}

${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

values.Subject: We want you back!

values.Email Content:
Hi member('First Name'), 


Check out this video from Gracie Barra World Champion Flavio Almeida
https://youtu.be/jqXGpk5F7E0


We would love to get you back on the mats. To help you get started back up we are going to invest in your training for a month.


Give us a call if you have any questions, we can’t wait to hear from you!


Kind Regards,
${submitterName}

 

${spaceAttributes('School Name')}

${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

values.Subject: Where there is a will, there is a way.

label: Members - When they receive the 3rd stripe on their white belt

values.Email Content:
Hi member('First Name'),

 

WOW—congratulations on earning your third stripe! 🥳 Your hard work, grit, and determination are truly paying off, and we couldn’t be prouder of you.

 

Achieving this milestone is no small feat, and it’s a testament to your dedication to becoming the best version of yourself, both on and off the mats.

 

This is a HUGE step forward in your Jiu-Jitsu journey! Now, you’re officially ready to level up by joining both GB1 and GB2 classes. 🎉 Make sure to check out our schedule and get ready to push yourself even further!

 

We’ve updated your attendance card to reflect this incredible achievement. If you have any questions about your next steps or what’s ahead, just let us know—we’re here to guide and cheer you on every step of the way!

 

Once again, congratulations on this amazing accomplishment. We can’t wait to see you rocking those mats in your next class. Let’s keep rolling—this is just the beginning!

 

See you on the mats,

${spaceAttributes('School Name')}

${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

values.Subject: 🥋 Big News: You’ve Earned Your Third Stripe! 🎉

label: Members - When they receive the their blue belt

values.Email Content:
Hi member('First Name'),

 

We are beyond thrilled to celebrate an incredible milestone with you—earning your blue belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu! This is a huge accomplishment, and we couldn’t be prouder of your hard work, perseverance, and dedication.

 

Did you know that only about 10% of people who start Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu ever achieve their blue belt? Reaching this level requires consistent effort, resilience, and the ability to overcome challenges—qualities you’ve shown time and time again. Even more impressive, less than 0.01% of the world’s population holds a BJJ blue belt. You’re now part of a small and elite group of practitioners worldwide!

 

Take a moment to celebrate this incredible milestone—you’ve truly earned it! We’re honored to be part of your journey and can’t wait to see all the amazing things you’ll accomplish next.

 

Keep shining, and know we’re cheering you on every step of the way!

 

With warmest congratulations,

${spaceAttributes('School Name')} Team

${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

values.Subject: Membership Matter

label: Members - 60 days after converted from a lead

values.Email Content:
Hi member('First Name'),

 

Congratulations on reaching your 60-day milestone with us at ${spaceAttributes('School Name')}! Two months of training is no small feat, and you’ve already come so far.

 

By now, you’ve probably felt the highs of nailing a technique and maybe the lows of a tough roll—it’s all part of the process. The important thing is that you’re still showing up, putting in the work, and growing stronger every time you step onto the mats.

 

Here’s why this milestone matters:

 

  • You’ve built a habit. Training regularly is one of the hardest parts, and you’re doing it!
  • You’ve learned the basics. Moves that seemed overwhelming when you started are now starting to feel second nature.
  • You’re building resilience. The mental and physical challenges of Jiu-Jitsu are tough, but you’re proving you can handle them.


The next phase of your journey is all about refining your skills and continuing to grow. Don’t be afraid to ask questions in class, work with your instructors, and reflect on how far you’ve come.

 

Remember, the journey isn’t about perfection—it’s about progress. Every step, no matter how small, is getting you closer to your goals. Keep showing up, stay consistent, and trust the process.

 

We’re proud to have you as part of the ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} family, and we can’t wait to see what you accomplish next.

 

See you on the mats!

Warm regards,
The ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} Team

The next phase of your journey is all about refining your skills and continuing to grow. Don’t be afraid to ask questions in class, work with your instructors, and reflect on how far you’ve come.

 

Remember, the journey isn’t about perfection—it’s about progress. Every step, no matter how small, is getting you closer to your goals. Keep showing up, stay consistent, and trust the process.

 

We’re proud to have you as part of the ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} family, and we can’t wait to see what you accomplish next.

 

See you on the mats!

Warm regards,
The ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} Team

values.Subject: 60 Days Strong—Keep It Up! 🥋

label: Members - When they receive the their purple belt

values.Email Content:
Congratulations member('First Name')!!

 

What an incredible milestone—congratulations on earning your purple belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu! This is a tremendous achievement and a testament to your unwavering dedication, passion, and grit.

 

Did you know that only about 1% of people who start Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu ever reach purple belt? Even more remarkable, less than 0.001% of the world’s population holds a purple belt. You’re now part of an extraordinarily small and elite group of practitioners who’ve made it this far. This level represents mastery of the fundamentals, creativity in your game, and the beginning of your journey as a mentor and role model to others on the mats.

 

It often takes 5 to 7 years of consistent training, discipline, and perseverance to earn a purple belt. Reaching this point reflects not only technical skill but also the growth of your mindset, problem-solving ability, and leadership within our community.

 

Take pride in how far you’ve come—this is a major step forward in your journey as a martial artist. We’re honored to have been part of your path so far and can’t wait to see the impact you’ll continue to make as you strive for even greater heights.

 

Let’s celebrate this amazing achievement together—you’ve truly earned it!

 

With deepest congratulations and respect,

${spaceAttributes('School Name')}

${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

values.Subject: 🌟 Huge Congratulations on Your Purple Belt!

label: Members - When they receive the their brown belt

values.Email Content:
Dear member('First Name'),

 

What an extraordinary achievement—congratulations on earning your brown belt in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu! This is one of the highest honors in the art, and we are incredibly proud of the dedication, resilience, and passion that brought you here.

 

Did you know that less than 0.5% of people who start Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu ever reach brown belt? On a global scale, fewer than 0.0005% of the world’s population hold a brown belt. You are part of an exceptionally rare group, marking a level of expertise that few achieve.

 

The journey to brown belt typically takes 8 to 10 years of consistent, focused training. It reflects mastery of the art, the ability to strategize and innovate, and a deep commitment to personal and technical growth. At this level, you’ve not only honed your skills but also embraced the role of a mentor and leader in the Jiu-Jitsu community.

 

Take a moment to reflect on how far you’ve come and how much you’ve accomplished. This belt is more than a symbol—it represents your perseverance, wisdom, and your love for the journey. We couldn’t be more excited to see how you’ll continue to grow as you prepare for the next incredible chapter.

 

Celebrate this outstanding milestone—you’ve truly earned it!

 

With deep respect and congratulations,

${spaceAttributes('School Name')}

${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

values.Subject: 🥋 The Journey Continues—Congratulations on Your Brown Belt

label: Members - When they receive the their black belt

values.Email Content:
Professor member('First Name')!

 

There are milestones in life that words simply cannot capture—and earning your black belt is one of them. This extraordinary achievement is a testament to years of discipline, sweat, and perseverance that only you can truly understand.

 

Did you know that only about 1 in 10,000 people who start Jiu-Jitsu ever achieve their black belt? Even more remarkable, fewer than 0.0001% of the world’s population hold this rank. Your dedication has placed you among the most elite practitioners of Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu.

 

This accomplishment marks the beginning of a new chapter, where you embrace the role of serving others—just as Jiu-Jitsu and Gracie Barra have served you. It’s now about giving back: guiding students, supporting your community, and inspiring those who are just starting their own Jiu-Jitsu journeys.

 

We couldn’t be prouder to see your dedication and hard work come full circle. The black belt is more than a rank; it’s a symbol of the person you’ve become, the challenges you’ve conquered, and the endless potential for what lies ahead.

 

Your journey continues, and we are excited to see how far you’ll go as you inspire and lead others on their own paths.

Congratulations, Professor member('First Name'), on this incredible and life-changing achievement!

 

With deepest respect and admiration,

${spaceAttributes('School Name')}

${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

values.Subject: The Black Belt—An Achievement Beyond Words

label: Members - When converted from a lead

values.Email Content:
Hi member('First Name'),


Thanks for enrolling at [GB School Name], and welcome to the team. When you become part of the team, you become part of the GB family. 

If you're on Facebook please request to join our private group - INSERT GROUP LINK

 

Also if you haven't already please like our social pages
- FACEBOOK PAGE - INSTAGRAM PAGE

 

Here is some important information you need to know: - Training Etiquette - Uniform Guidelines - How To Wash Your Uniform 

 

We have created an account for you to use at ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} Members. Go to https://gbschoolname.gbmembers.net to login! You can book in for your classes and change any billing details. Your username is [insert username]. The first time you login, you can create your own password. Let us know if you have any questions with your new account!

 

All of our Instructors are available for private classes if you ever want to learn one-on-one, or speed up your development. We would love to offer you a 30 minute complimentary private class with the Instructor of your choice so you can understand the benefit of these classes!

 

Being connected with our [GB School Name] team members is important within our GB community and also helps with keeping everyone up to date with all the action and ongoing information being sent out. If you have any questions please don't hesitate to contact us on the below contacts.

 

Kind Regards,

${spaceAttributes('School Name')}

${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

- FACEBOOK PAGE - INSTAGRAM PAGE

 

Here is some important information you need to know: - Training Etiquette - Uniform Guidelines - How To Wash Your Uniform 

 

We have created an account for you to use at ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} Members. Go to https://gbschoolname.gbmembers.net to login! You can book in for your classes and change any billing details. Your username is [insert username]. The first time you login, you can create your own password. Let us know if you have any questions with your new account!

 

All of our Instructors are available for private classes if you ever want to learn one-on-one, or speed up your development. We would love to offer you a 30 minute complimentary private class with the Instructor of your choice so you can understand the benefit of these classes!

 

Being connected with our [GB School Name] team members is important within our GB community and also helps with keeping everyone up to date with all the action and ongoing information being sent out. If you have any questions please don't hesitate to contact us on the below contacts.

 

Kind Regards,

${spaceAttributes('School Name')}

${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

values.Subject: Welcome To The Gracie Barra Team!

label: Leads - 7 days after the intro class

values.Email Content:
Hi member('First Name')! 


Here are 7 reasons why Gracie Barra Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu is awesome!


1) Fostering Self-Discipline – One of the central elements of Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu is a focus on self-discipline. Today, we are so accustomed to receiving instant gratification that lessons in self-restraint and discipline aren’t always easy to come by. Anyone with a martial arts background, however, is continually reminded of how essential self-discipline is.


2) Boosting Socialisation Skills – If you don’t always thrive in highly social environments, you may find it easier to get to know people and make new friends when you're in a room filled with peers who share a common interest. Students of Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu are able to get to know one another through shared pursuits. Partner-driven forms like jiu jitsu can also foster camaraderie, as they force us to pair off and build our skills together.


3) Encouraging Physical Activity – We all need the extra encouragement from our like-minded teammates. Enrolling ourselves in such a physically demanding pastime not only discourages the sedentary lifestyle we are used to, but also gives us an enjoyable activity that inspires us to keep moving.


4) Learning to Set and Achieve Goals – Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu is based around an accomplishment system of coloured belts that signify your level. When we strive toward each new belt, we learn valuable lessons about setting and reaching our goals.


5) Problem solving – Let’s face it. Most people are not great problem solvers, most are complainers. Problem solving is like a muscle. The more you exercise it, the better it gets. The problems in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu are more than what the untrained eye sees. It isn’t always about who is faster, stronger, or more flexible. You need timing, strategy, assessment, and calmness. If you are about to get submitted, you need to do some problem solving. Panic usually will end badly. You need to think clear when you are in a struggle and yes sometimes the best solution is to tap out and reset.


6) Increased Self-Esteem – Confidence comes with achievement, so our self-esteem level will get a boost with every new move we master and every belt we earn. The ones who struggle with a low sense of self-worth usually become more confident as time progresses while training in a Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu class. You will understand truly how much you are capable of.


7) Instilling a Sense of Respect – Learning Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu will require to show your instructor and teammates with unflinching respect. Today’s culture doesn’t always include respect for authority, adults or those in advanced positions. When attending our practices, we will be learning lessons in respect along with new moves. Plus self respect is a huge deal.
Flavio's motivational video: https://youtu.be/jqXGpk5F7E0

 

Kind Regards,

${submitterName}

${spaceAttributes('School Name')} Team

 

${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

values.Subject: Give Yourself A Chance

label: Members - Once cancellation from has been completed

values.Email Content:
Hi member('First Name'), 

 

This email is to confirm that we have successfully cancelled your membership as per request on [Request Date]. We are sorry to hear that you are canceling your membership. 

 

If you are cancelling because you are not seeing results or have lost motivation, feel free to speak to us. We can help reinvigorate your training by offering you a 30 minute private training session free of charge with one of our qualified instructors. The session will be tailored to your level, experience and goals and are aimed to improve your jiu-jitsu, motivate and get you back on track. Feel free to contact us to take advantage of the option above or to hear more ways we can help you achieve your goals.

 

Please note that we need 30 days notice in order for your cancellation to take effect in our system, as per your policy. As such, your final payment will be on [insert date] (and remember that you can still train during this time). We hope you have enjoyed your training at ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} and hope to see you back on the mat in the future.

Should you have any questions please let me know.

 

Kind Regards,

 

I've seen 1000 people quit! Video:
https://youtu.be/kT2T-cNvm60

 

${spaceAttributes('School Name')} Team

 

${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

values.Subject: Stripe Member Cancellation

values.Email Content:
Dear Students and Families,

 

We hope all is well with you, and that your experience on the mat at ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} continues to be filled with great Jiu-Jitsu, learning, fun, and friendship.


We are so proud of the work that ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} has been doing in our community for the past several years.  Changing people's lives through Jiu-Jitsu in a positive family environment is our mission. We've made a concerted effort to keep tuition at the same rates, even as the cost of doing business continues to rise significantly year after year. Therefore, we have made the decision to implement a new consistent pricing policy that may affect your current membership setup.
These additional fees will allow ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} to keep up with rising costs, adding more staff, and improve compensation for our current employees, as well as keeping the overall health of the school so we can continue to provide you with the best experience possible.

 

Our current price policy is $48.62 per week, for our current students which represents an average of $16 per class for a single member.

 

All members are charged $97.26 on a bi-weekly basis.

 

If your tuition is monthly, it will be changed to bi-weekly.

In full transparency, this will result in an increase of about $21 per month or less per member.

For those of you coming 3 times per week, this is only $1.80 per class more on average.


We are still confident that Jiu-Jitsu continues to be the most economical and most reasonably priced activity for you and your family. We are thankful and appreciate you, and we hope that you continue to see the amazing benefits of what we have to offer.


As always, please feel free to reach out with any questions or concerns.


${spaceAttributes('School Name')} Team

 

${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

values.Subject: Gracie Barra Arcadia Membership Update

label: tuition Increase - Membership Increase - admin fee

values.Email Content:
Dear ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} Students and Parents,

We hope all is well with you, and that your experience on the mat at ${spaceAttributes('School Name')}  continues to be filled with great Jiu-Jitsu, learning, and fun!


The main purpose of this email is to inform you that ${spaceAttributes('School Name')}  will be transitioning to the new GB Members Software for school operations, management, and billing. This software was built by Gracie Barra... for Gracie Barra. It's our belief that the specific capabilities and features of this management tool will help in giving our school an even better overall experience.


It's important that we disclose to you that going forward a small admin fee of 1.33% of your tuition will be added to your tuition dues. 


We've made a concerted effort to keep tuition at the same rates, even as the cost of doing business continues to rise year after year. This small additional fee will allow us to keep tuition steady, while helping our school to remain healthy.


As always, please feel free to reach out with any questions or concerns.


-- 


Kind Regards,

${spaceAttributes('School Name')} Team

${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

label: Members - Once Freeze form has been completed

values.Email Content:
Hi member('First Name'),

 

Thank you for contacting us. This email is to confirm we have frozen member('First Name') membership as per request.

 

member('First Name') membership will be frozen starting [ Enter Start date] and will reactivate on [Enter End date].   Payment will resume [Enter Resume payment date.

 

In case you wish to extend the freeze, kindly send us an email at least 3 business days before the reactivation date. If this is incorrect or for any changes, reply to this email. Thank you and we look forward to seeing member('First Name') soon on the mats.

 

Kind Regards,

${spaceAttributes('School Name')}

Address: ${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

Phone: ${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

Have a great day!

 

- ${submitterName}

${spaceAttributes('School Name')}

${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

values.Subject: Summer Special

values.Email Content:
Hi member('First Name'),

 

We haven't been able to reach you yet to set up your intro class at Gracie Barra.

 

This intro class is at no cost to you! An intro class is a great way to experience Jiu-Jitsu for the first time in a family-friendly, fun and safe environment!

 

To get a quick glimpse, click on the link below: 
ADULT PROGRAM
KIDS PROGRAM

Challenge yourself, start TODAY.  Please reply to this email with a day and time that would work best for you to schedule the intro.  This intro class is at no cost to you!

 

Kind Regards,

${spaceAttributes('School Name')}

Address: ${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

values.Subject: Challenge Yourself!

values.Email Content:
Hello member('First Name'),

 

Are you interested in registering for an IBJJF Competition?

 

Here is how you register for the first time: 

 

Access https://ibjjf.com/athletes/become-a-member
Choose “Are you a first-time membership applicant?”
Enter the requested information (Birth Date, Belt, and Country)
Create your athlete login and fill out your information
Open a new membership request and upload all required documents.
Academy is Gracie Barra Arizona 

Professor is Paulo Edurado Viera Nunes Freire (he will sign electronically)

 

Please note:

  • The membership request will not be submitted for review until all of the required documents have been uploaded to the online request.
  • Once your registration is approved, you can sign up for any No-Gi competitions under IBJFF. 
  • The registration is valid for one year

Please don't hesitate to reach out if you need any assistance.

 

Kind Regards,

${spaceAttributes('School Name')}

Address: ${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

Phone: ${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

label: Leads - On create - Book Your Class Now!

values.Email Content:
Hi member('First Name'), 

 

Thank you for your interest in our school! At Gracie Barra, we’re proud to be part of the largest Jiu-Jitsu team in the world, with over 1,000 schools worldwide—and we’re excited to welcome you to our family!

 

Here at ${spaceAttributes('School Name')}, we carry on the Gracie Barra legacy, and now you have the chance to be a part of it too. 💪

 

We’d love for you (or your child) to join us for a complimentary intro class! This is the perfect opportunity to meet our instructors, get a feel for our community, and experience the art of Jiu-Jitsu firsthand.

 

It’s easy to schedule your free class:

 

Reply to this email with your preferred contact method, and we’ll get back to you to arrange a time.


Or, click the button below to find a convenient time that works for you!

We can’t wait to see you on the mats and help you take your first step into an incredible journey with Jiu-Jitsu. Let’s do this! 👊🔺

 

Warm regards,
Find a time

Kind Regards,

${spaceAttributes('School Name')}

Address: ${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

Phone: ${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

values.Subject: Special Schedule

values.Email Content:
Hi member('First Name'),

 

Thank you for your interest in Gracie Barra Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and Self Defense.  We have been trying to connect with you to set up your intro class at no cost to you. We know how life can get busy with work, school and family. Even though all of the hustle and bustle of your daily grind, you found time to reach out to us to learn a little more about Gracie Barra Jiu Jitsu.

 

Now it's time to take the next step and set up that intro class for you or your child!

 

Gracie Barra will get you in the best shape of your life while you learn the most effective martial art on the planet in a fun, clean, safe, and family oriented environment.
ADULT PROGRAM
KIDS PROGRAM

Check out our programs.  Please reply to this email with a day and time that would work best for you to schedule the intro.  This intro class is at no cost to you!

 

Kind Regards,

${spaceAttributes('School Name')}

Address: ${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

Phone: ${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

label: Leads - On create Adult Trial Booking

values.Email Content:
Hi member('First Name'), 

 

Please complete one of the following waiver forms prior to attending your free trial class on ${Intro Scheduled Date}. We look forward to seeing you on the mats!

 

Adults Waiver form

 

Please come dressed in active clothing and we will provide you with a Gi (Uniform) to wear over the top. We ask that you also wear easy to remove footwear. Thank you! 😄

 

Please let us know if you have any issues or questions.

 

Kind Regards,

${spaceAttributes('School Name')}

Address: ${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

Phone: ${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

Sold To: ${values('Person Name')}
${vars('ApparelsTable')} ${vars('ServicesTable')} ${vars('PackagesTable')}

Hello member('First Name') member('Last Name'),


We're excited to share some great news with you – your journey with Gracie Barra is about to resume!

Here's What You Need to Know:

  • Membership Resumption Date: $DATE{${values('Resume Date')}}
  • Membership Fee: $${values('Membership Cost')}
  • Billing Frequency: ${values('Billing Payment Period')}

Your membership will automatically reactivate on the resume date mentioned above. We can't wait to welcome you back to the mats and continue our journey together in the art of Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu.

What's Next?

  • Prepare for Training: Make sure your gear is ready, and you're set to return.
  • Stay Updated: Check out our latest class schedules and upcoming events on our website or app.
  • Reach Out: If you have any questions or need assistance, please don't hesitate to contact us. 

We're looking forward to seeing you again. The Gracie Barra community is a family, and every member's presence strengthens our bond and passion for BJJ.

Thank you for being a valued part of our Gracie Barra family. We look forward to seeing you soon and continuing our journey together.

Warm regards,

${spaceAttributes('School Name')} Team

Address: ${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

Phone: ${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

values.Subject: Welcome Back to ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} - Your Training Resumes Soon!

values.Email Content:
Hi ${values('Student First Name')},

 

Congratulations on the start of your BJJ journey.

 

Your member registration details are as follows:
Student Name ${values('Student First Name')} ${values('Student Last Name')}
Include Family Members ${values('Include Family Members')}
Payment Frequency ${vars('payment_frequency')}

Members

NameProgramFee
Canada Custom GB Membership - GB Bi-weekly 99.98
Membership ${values('Fee Total')}
I promise to pay equal ${vars('payment_frequency')} instalments of ${values('I promise to pay equal FREQUENCY instalments of')}
to ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} . The first instalment is due on ${appearance('${values('The first instalment is due on')}${format('Month DD, YYYY (no time)')}')}
and subsequent instalments are to be paid ${vars('payment_frequency')} afterwards until I give notice that I wish to stop payments according to the terms and conditions including cancellation and membership freeze terms below.

Gracie Barra Terms and Conditions

${values('Terms Information Text')}

Kind Regards,

${spaceAttributes('School Name')}

Address: ${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

Phone: ${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

values.Subject: Update your Payment details

label: Leads - Intro Scheduled Adult or Child - send waiver

values.Email Content:
Hi member('First Name'), 

 

Please complete one of the following waiver forms prior to attending your free trial class on ${Intro Scheduled Date}. We look forward to seeing you on the mats!

 

Adults Waiver form

or 

Childrens Waiver form

 

Please come dressed in active clothing and we will provide you with a Gi (Uniform) to wear over the top. We ask that you also wear easy to remove footwear. Thank you! 😄

 

Please let us know if you have any issues or questions.

 

Kind Regards,

${spaceAttributes('School Name')}

Address: ${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

Phone: ${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

values.Subject: Gracie Barra Waiver Form

label: Self Sign Up - Self Sign Up - First Adult Class

values.Email Content:
Hi member('First Name'),

We hope you’re as excited as we are for your first class at ${spaceAttributes('School Name')}! As you prepare to join us on the mats, here are a few tips to help you get started:

What to Expect:

  • Warm-Up: We’ll start with exercises to prepare your body.

  • Techniques: Learn fundamental moves and positions.

  • Rolling: Experience live sparring in a safe environment.

Preparation Tips:

  • What to Wear: Comfortable athletic clothing. If you have a Gracie Barra Uniform, bring it along. If not, we have GIs available for purchase at the school.

  • What to Bring: A water bottle and an open mind ready to learn!

  • Arrival Time: Arrive at least 15 minutes early to get acquainted with the facility and meet our friendly staff.

  • Class Etiquette: Respect your fellow students and instructors. BJJ is as much about discipline and respect as it is about technique.

Check out this video on what to expect during your first class.

We can’t wait to see you on the mats. Remember, the most important thing is to have fun and enjoy the journey!

If you have any questions, please reply to this email or contact us at ${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}.

See you soon!

Kind Regards,

${spaceAttributes('School Name')}

Address: ${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

Phone: ${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

values.Subject: Get Ready for Your First Jiu-Jitsu Class!

label: Self Sign Up - Self Sign up Child Welcome - New School

values.Email Content:
Hi member('First Name')’s Parent or Guardian,

We're excited to welcome member('First Name') to the Gracie Barra family! Choosing ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} for your child's Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu journey is fantastic.

Our team is dedicated to providing a safe and supportive environment where your child can thrive. Our curriculum, designed by Master Carlos Gracie Jr., focuses on building confidence, discipline, and respect.

Grand Opening Event: Join us on $DATE{${spaceAttributes('School Start Date')}} for the grand opening of ${spaceAttributes('School Name')}. We look forward to meeting you and your family!

Preparation Tips:

  • Consistency: Regular attendance is key to progress.

  • Gear: Ensure your child has their GI and belt ready for class.

  • Learning: Check out this video on properly tying the belt.

If you have any questions or need assistance, please don't hesitate to ask. Visit our website at ${spaceAttributes('School Website')} for more information about our programs, schedules, and instructors.

We recommend watching the other videos within the GB Online Welcome Package to prepare for your first class and more. 

 

Lastly, arrive at least 15 minutes early to your first class to discuss getting your official GB Uniform from the front desk. 

 

Again, welcome to Gracie Barra...let the Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu journey begin! We can't wait to see member('First Name') on the mats!

Kind Regards,

${spaceAttributes('School Name')}

Address: ${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

Phone: ${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

values.Subject: Welcome to Gracie Barra, member('First Name')!

label: Self Sign Up - Self Sign up Adult Welcome - Existing School

values.Email Content:
Hi member('First Name'),

Welcome to the Gracie Barra family! We're thrilled you chose ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} for your Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu journey.

As you embark on this path, you can expect top-notch instruction, motivation, and support from our dedicated team. Whether you're new to BJJ or have prior experience, our curriculum, crafted by Master Carlos Gracie Jr., is designed to help you grow and excel.

Preparation Tips:

  • Consistency: Regular attendance is key to progress.

  • Gear: Ensure you have your GI, Rashguard, and belt ready for class.

  • Learning: Check out this video on properly tying your belt.

If you have any questions or need assistance, please don't hesitate to ask. Visit our website at ${spaceAttributes('School Website')} for more information about our programs, schedules, and instructors.

We recommend watching the other videos within the GB Online Welcome Package to prepare for your first class and more. 

 

Lastly, arrive at least 15 minutes early to your first class to discuss getting your official GB Uniform from the front desk. 

 

Again, welcome to Gracie Barra...let the Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu journey begin! We can't wait to see you on the mats!

Kind Regards,

${spaceAttributes('School Name')}

Address: ${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

Phone: ${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}
values.Template Name: Self Sign up Adult Welcome - Existing School

values.Subject: Welcome to Gracie Barra, member('First Name')!

label: Self Sign Up - Self Sign Up - First Childs Class

values.Email Content:
Hi member('First Name')’s Parent or Guardian,

member('First Name')’s first class at Gracie Barra is an exciting step! As you prepare them to join us on the mats, here are a few tips to help get started:

What to Expect:

  • Warm-Up: A series of exercises to get everyone ready.
  • Techniques: Learning fundamental moves and positions in a fun, engaging way.
  • Games and Drills: Activities designed to teach skills and build camaraderie.

Preparation Tips:

  • What to Wear: Comfortable athletic clothing and easy-to-remove shoes. If you have a Gracie Barra Uniform, bring it along. If not, we have GIs available for purchase at the school.
  • What to Bring: A water bottle and an open mind ready to learn!
  • Arrival Time: Arrive at least 15 minutes early to get acquainted with the facility and meet our friendly staff.
  • Class Etiquette: Respect your fellow students and instructors. BJJ is as much about discipline and respect as it is about technique.

Check out this video on what to expect during your first class.

We can’t wait to see member('First Name') on the mats. Remember, the most important thing is for them to have fun and enjoy the journey!

If you have any questions, please reply to this email or contact us at ${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}.

See you soon!

Kind Regards,

${spaceAttributes('School Name')}

Address: ${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

Phone: ${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}
values.Template Name: Self Sign Up - First Childs Class

values.Subject: Member Waiver Form

values.Email Content:
Hi member('First Name'),

 

Today marks something truly special: one year since you stepped onto the mats at ${spaceAttributes('School Name')}! This milestone isn’t just about time—it’s about transformation, grit, and the legacy you’re building for yourself.

 

A Year That Changed Everything

 

Think about it. Over the past year:

 

  • You’ve stepped out of your comfort zone.
  • You’ve embraced challenges that once seemed impossible.
  • You’ve learned not just techniques, but lessons about patience, resilience, and strength.

This isn’t just about Jiu-Jitsu. It’s about showing up for yourself, again and again, no matter what.

 

Your Journey is Inspiring


Every roll, every drill, every moment on the mats is part of a story—your story. Whether you realize it or not, you’re inspiring those around you. The energy and dedication you bring to the mats lift everyone up, and we’re grateful to have you as part of our team.

 

What Comes Next?


You’ve built a foundation, and now it’s time to dream bigger. What will the next chapter of your Jiu-Jitsu journey look like?

 

Dive deeper into your training. Is there a technique you’ve been eyeing or a position you want to master? Now’s the time.


Expand your horizons. Maybe you’re ready to try a competition or help mentor a newer student.


Strengthen your bonds. Jiu-Jitsu is about community, and the people you train with are your extended family.


We’re Proud to Be Part of Your Story


One year ago, you made a decision that’s shaped your life—and ours. Thank you for trusting us with your journey and for being an irreplaceable part of the ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} family.

 

As we look ahead, know that we’re here to support you every step of the way. Whether it’s reaching new milestones, working through challenges, or celebrating victories, we’re honored to be in your corner.

 

Here’s to you, member('First Name'). The best is yet to come.

 

With gratitude and excitement,
The ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} Team

${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

values.Subject: One Year of Jiu-Jitsu—Your Journey, Your Legacy 🥋✨

values.Email Content:
Hi member('First Name'),

 

Guess what? You’ve done it again—another year of dedication, growth, and rolling with the punches (literally)! 🎊

 

Here at ${spaceAttributes('School Name')}, we’re blown away by your commitment. Whether it’s been 1 year, 3 years, or 10 years, every moment you’ve spent on the mats adds to the legacy you’re building—not just for yourself, but for the entire team.

 

Celebrate Your Journey


Think about it:

 

You’ve spent countless hours improving your technique, resilience, and mindset.


You’ve rolled through victories, learned from challenges, and come out stronger each time.


You’ve inspired everyone around you—your teammates, your instructors, and the new faces that look up to you as an example of what dedication looks like.


A Gift for Your Commitment 🎁
As a token of our appreciation, we want to gift you a free Gracie Barra T-shirt to celebrate your milestone! Just show this email at the front desk, and we’ll make sure you leave with some fresh GB swag.

 

Here’s to the Next Year 🥋


Every year brings new opportunities to grow—whether it’s mastering a technique, trying a tournament, or continuing to show up as a source of positive energy for your team. Whatever comes next, we’re honored to be part of your Jiu-Jitsu journey.

 

Thank you for being such an integral part of ${spaceAttributes('School Name')}. This team wouldn’t be the same without you, and we can’t wait to see what amazing things you’ll accomplish in the year ahead!

 

Here’s to more rolls, more growth, and more wins—on and off the mats.

 

See you soon,
The ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} Team

${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

values.Subject: Another Year, Another Victory—You’re a Jiu-Jitsu Legend! 🥋🎉

values.Email Content:
Dear member('First Name'),


Welcome to the Gracie Barra family! As you embark on your Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu journey, we are here to support you every step of the way toward mastery. We're thrilled to offer you a specially curated Welcome Package from GB Online to jumpstart your training.


🎁 Unlock Your Welcome Package Immerse yourself in the essence of Jiu-Jitsu with exclusive access to our GB Online Welcome Package. This handpicked collection of premium resources is designed to lay the foundation of your training, connect you with the legacy of our global community, and inspire your practice both on and off the mats.


Access Your Welcome Package Here: GB Online Welcome Package

What You'll Discover:

  • Your Journey at Gracie Barra & The GB Legacy: Explore the rich history and core values that have shaped our community.
  • The GB Training Experience: Gain insights into what makes our training methodology unique and effective.
  • Excelling as a White Belt & White Belt Blueprint: Practical advice and strategies to navigate your initial phase of training.
  • GB1 Tip of the Week by Prof Braulio Estima: Weekly wisdom to elevate your learning and practice.
  • Safety Through Breakfalls by Kaliffa Oliveira: Essential techniques to ensure your practice is safe from the very beginning.

This Welcome Package is the first step on a transformative journey. We're committed to guiding you, supporting your growth, and celebrating your achievements as you progress.


Should you have any questions or need further guidance, please feel free to reach out. Welcome to the family, and let's embark on this remarkable journey together.


Warm regards,

 

${spaceAttributes('School Name')} team.

${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

values.Email Content:
Dear member('First Name'),

 

We hope this email finds you well! We wanted to take a moment to introduce you to an invaluable resource within Gracie Barra – the GB Institute. As a dedicated entity focused on education, research, and development efforts in Jiu-Jitsu instruction and school management best practices, the GB Institute plays a crucial role in empowering our community members.


Here are some key highlights about the GB Institute:

  • Educational Courses: The Institute offers a range of courses catering to students, athletes, instructors, and school owners. From foundational programs to specialized courses in marketing, leadership development, and more, there's something for everyone seeking to enhance their Jiu-Jitsu journey.
  • Instructors Certification Program (ICP): One of the flagship programs, the ICP, equips instructors with world-class teaching principles, leadership skills, and the GB philosophy, ensuring a high standard of instruction across all Gracie Barra schools.
  • Mission and Values:  The GB Institute’s mission is to empower all members of the GB community through education, access to new experiences, and exchange of knowledge to fulfill Gracie Barra's purpose of enhancing people's lives and changing the world through the practice of Jiu-Jitsu. We are guided by the core values of Brotherhood/Sisterhood, Integrity, and Development, aligning closely with Gracie Barra's mission of Jiu-Jitsu for Everyone. 

 

To delve deeper into the offerings and benefits of the GB Institute, We encourage you to visit their website at https://institute.graciebarra.com/. Whether you're looking to expand your knowledge, improve your teaching skills, or grow as a school owner, the GB Institute is here to support your journey.

 

Feel free to reach out if you have any questions or need further information. Let's continue to grow and learn together through the power of Jiu-Jitsu!

 

Let's Grow Together,

 

The GBI Team

values.Email Content:
Hi member('First Name'),

 

This is a reminder that your recurring payment for your Gracie Barra ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} membership is scheduled in the next few days.

 

To view the details of your upcoming billing, click below:

👉 [View My Upcoming Payment]

 

If you’d like to make any changes to your membership or cancel, please contact us directly:

 

📧 Email: ${spaceAttributes('School Email')}
📞 Phone: ${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

 

Thank you for being part of our GB family.

 

Gracie Barra
${spaceAttributes('School Name')}

values.Email Content:
Hi member('First Name'),

 

We are in the process of migrating data to our new CRM system.

We need to configure your billing details into the new system.

 

Please complete your Member Registration form with the following link Click here.

Kind Regards,

${spaceAttributes('School Name')}

Address: ${spaceAttributes('School Address')}

Phone: ${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}
